item.title: Python default arguments can be...tricky
item.description: Debugging is fun, and according to me debugging time exponentially increases if the code was written in a sloppy manner.

item.title: Intuitive understanding of Eigenvectors: Key to PCA
item.description: Truly understanding Principal Component Analysis (PCA) requires a clear understanding of the concepts behind linear algebra, especially Eigenvectors.
